description: This file defines a Flutter widget representing a filter screen with various filter options such as hair color, religion, ethnicity, height, and weight. It includes UI components like checkboxes, sliders, buttons, and manages state interactions with a FilterProvider.

classes.name: FilterScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget representing the main filter screen with an app bar, filter options, and action buttons.

classes.name: _FilterBody
classes.description: A StatefulWidget displaying filter controls such as checkboxes and sliders for various filter criteria.

methods.name: _onReset
methods.description: Resets the filters to default values and shows a confirmation snackbar.

methods.name: _onResetLocal
methods.description: Resets local filter settings to initial state, updating sliders, and shows a snackbar.

methods.name: _buildEnumCheckboxGroup
methods.description: Builds a group of checkboxes for enum options with custom styling and interaction.

methods.name: _enumLabel
methods.description: Converts enum names in camelCase to human-readable labels.
